nodes.name: OwnBase

nodes.documentation:
@dev The OwnBase constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract to the sender
account.
@dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.
nodes.name: onlyOwner

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param _newOwner address : The address to transfer ownership to.
nodes.name: transferOwnership
renounceOwnership

@dev Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param _newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.

nodes.documentation: @dev Allows the newOwner address to finalize the transfer.

nodes.documentation: @dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.
